SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ChangePasswordAlreadyLoggedInController
Controller for handling password changes for users who are already logged in.
ChangePasswordController
Controller for handling password change requests for users who have successfully passed security checks and are changing their password.
ChangePasswordEmailController
Controller for handling password changes via email verification.
CheckUserEmailForm
This form is used to help handle checking for a valid email
CustomUserDetails
Defines our custom user details object, used to store information for a user, such as their username, hashed password, user object, and keeps track of if the account is not expired, locked, has valid credentials, and is enabled.
CustomUserDetailsService
Creates our own implementation of UserDetailsService, so spring security knows how to get/load a user's information.
DeletePlaylistForm
This form is used to help handle deleting a playlist
DeleteSongFromPlaylistForm
This form is used to help handle deleting a playlist
InitMusicApplication
The main entry point for the InitMusic application.
LoginController
Controller for handling login-related requests.
LoginForm
A form object for handling user login data.
MainController
MainController handles requests for the root URL of the application.
MethodOutcome
This enum is used to assist with providing user feedback after operations are performed, like adding, deleting, or creating playlists.
NewPasswordForm
This form is used to help handle setting a new password
NewPlaylistForm
This form is used to make a new playlist.
NewSongForm
This form is used when a song is going to be added to a playlist.
PassSecurityController
Controller for handling user security questions validation.
PassSQuestionsForm
This form is used when a user is setting their security questions
Playlist
This class is used to represent Playlist objects, and maps to our database table.
PlaylistController
This controller handles the playlist page, which is where users can do things like look at their playlists and add/remove playlists.
PlaylistRepository
Repository used for managing and retrieving the Playlist Entity
PlaylistService
Interface for PlaylistService, defines methods related to interacting with playlists.
PlaylistServiceImpl
Service class which interacts with playlists.
PlaylistServiceTests
Unit tests for the PlaylistService class.
PlaylistTests
Tests the basic functions related to playlist model
ProfileController
Controller responsible for handling user profile-related actions such as displaying user details and deleting a user account.
QueryCache
QueryCache JPA model, used to store queries and their results.
QueryCacheRepository
Repository used for retrieving QueryCache Entities
QueryCacheTests
Tests the bast methods in QueryCache class
RegisterController
Controller for handling user registration.
RegistrationForm
A form object for handling user registration data.
RenamePlaylistForm
This form is used for renaming a playlist.
SearchController
This Controller handles the search page, which is where users can search for songs and add them to playlists
SecurityConfig
Security configuration for the application.
SecurityQuestionsController
Controller for handling the submission and display of security questions.
SecurityQuestionsForm
This form is used for setting user's security questions and their answers
Song
This class is used to represent songs, and stores several attributes about each song.
SongRepository
Repository used for retrieving Song Entities
SongSearchDeezerImpl
Implementation of the SongSearchService Interface that uses the Deezer API to search for songs.
SongSearchService
Defines methods related to searching for songs using an API
SongService
Defines methods related to searching for songs
SongServiceImpl
This services handles Searching for songs using the deezer api.
SongTests
Tests the basic methods in the song class
UpdateSecurityQuestionsController
Handles mappings for updating a users security questions
User
This class is used to represent User objects, and maps to our database table.
UserDetailsServiceTests
Tests the CustomUserDetailsService class
UserRepository
Repository used for managing and retrieving the User Entity
UserService
Interface for UserService, defines methods related to user transactions like creating and updating user objects, and creating and updating playlist objects for users.
UserServiceImpl
Service class for handling user-related operations.
UserServiceTests
Tests the methods in userService
UserTests
Tests the basic methods in the user class
ViewPlaylistController
This Controller handles the view playlist page, which is where users can view an individual playlist and edit its contents
